content: When the first Poison Chief is down, fly up and continue left toward the water. Go almost to the end of the water, where you should see a giant creature. When you get close to it, it will leap in the air and jump to a nearby rock. Fly over to it, then land on its head.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Feng-Tail_General.md", within the section "Feng-Tail General" and the sub-section "How to Find Feng-Tail General". The content is presented below:

When the first Poison Chief is down, fly up and continue left toward the water. Go almost to the end of the water, where you should see a giant creature. When you get close to it, it will leap in the air and jump to a nearby rock. Fly over to it, then land on its head.
